info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 28 at 4:34AM EST until January 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, especially for elevations above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield County. In New York, Western Schenectady, Eastern Rensselaer, Schoharie, Eastern Columbia and Western Ulster Counties. In Vermont, Bennington and eastern Windham Counties. In Massachusetts, southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...From 6 AM Sunday to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel is expected due to snow covered roadways and reduced visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Valley areas will see snow mixed with rain during the day on Sunday, reducing snow accumulations.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
